TopicTitle: If KSP had a World War II mod

Articles.Content: I wonder if KSP will get a WW2 mod.It will be really cool though.Like WW2 plane's fuselages,wigs,cockpits,WW2 tanks and other World War 2 guns and bombs.If someone can make a mod like that it will be super freakin awsome.I really like World War 2 stuff it's really cool and stuff.But if someone is kind enough to make this World War 2 mod but i recommend to put most of the stuff that World War 2 like bombs,planes,tanks and even vehicles. And Thank You!!
